评论概述: I'm in love with the item and the price!
评论详情: I've always bought these glasses at local stores but when I realized how much the price difference was for the same item I decided to research! They are the perfect size and do a great job of blocking a little bit of sun! I use them daily and they are still in great condition!

I have a small face yet these large sunglasses look perfect and SO adorable! I get compliments from everyone I meet when I wear them. I am a child of the late 60s/early 70s so you just know I love these! I always adored the way Janis Joplin looked wearing hers! Tinted light enough to wear them indoors too. I had some eyelid surgery and I really appreciated being able to wear them indoors and still see great. I felt the same way about them when I had a stye that took 2 weeks to heal. Driving they cut the glare a "little" on partly sunny or overcast days but when there is sun glare I use my more traditional dark sunglasses.
I love big eyewear. This one was big! It covers my eyebrows too. Very lovely.

(Photo shown is Gold/Purple/Pink color) I am DONE losing expensive prescription sunglasses once and for all! It's happened to me twice already and it won't happen again. These cost a tiny fraction of what I've been spending and they work absolutely great over my regular prescription glasses and that' how I've been wearing them!  I originally ordered them to use as Janis Joplin Pearl-type glasses for dressing up (as the hippie I used to be) for a costume party. I ordered 3 different colors figuring that I'd return 1 or 2 but I liked them so much that I'm keeping all 3 and am using them regularly over my glasses and have even gotten compliments on them! My prescription glasses are wire rimmed and lightweight so these fit over them easily and it's not all that noticeable that I'm wearing 2 pairs - and if it is, I don't care because it's not worth the $500+ it would cost to replace the prescription shades I lost. These are keepers and not only are they comfortable but they're flattering because they balance out my somewhat oblong face. I love them!
